message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, which I'm sure you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I've seen in similar products.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I've given it some more thought, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering it to you for $1800000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.

I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I've seen in similar products, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm now offering the product to you for $1600000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm confident you'll find it a great opportunity.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I've seen in similar products, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.
